title: All the Backlist! October 7, 2022
description:
This week, Tirzah recommend two excellent YA horror novels that are 10+ years old. You might have to go digging for copies, but they are definitely worth it!
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or Stitcher and never miss a book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.

This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

BOOKS DISCUSSED
Bleeding Violet by Dia Reeves
Slice of Cherry by Dia Reeves
Miscreated by Dia Reeves
Frost by Marianna Baer
The Inconceivable Life of Quinn by Marianna Baer
Wolfwood by Marianna Baer
